mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, AVG(cashbook_price) revenue FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='수입' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, AVG(cashbook_price) expenditure FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='지출' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, AVG((case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) -(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) profit FROM cashbook GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM(cashbook_price) revenue FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='수입' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM(cashbook_price) expenditure FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='지출' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM((case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) -(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) profit FROM cashbook GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);
